series_description: This series documents groundwater permitting, including well construction and abandonment, geophysical data, drilling, submersible pumps, and aquifer testing. This series may include, but is not limited to: GW-2 forms, logs, and reports.

This series documents the processing of groundwater withdrawal applications and issuance or denial of permits. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, permits, fact sheets, construction & engineering plans and field notes, correspondence, aquifer picks, and Virginia Department of Health engineering description sheets.

This series documents compliance with the groundwater withdrawal permitting program, including water quality, levels, inspections, warnings and notices, and corrective actions. This series may include, but is not limited to: reports and correspondence.
